thread.title: Fire razes urban poor community in Malabon
thread.title_full: Fire razes urban poor community in Malabon

title: Fire razes urban poor community in Malabon
text:
Fire razes urban poor community in Malabon (philstar.com)  26am In a tweet on Wednesday, February 8, Philippine Red Cross chairman Sen. Richard Gordon said that the organization has dispatched a fire truck and two ambulances as fire razed houses in a Malabon barangay. Sen. Richard Gordon/Twitter MANILA, Philippines — A fire razed an urban poor community in Malabon City Wednesday evening with alarm levels reaching Task Force Bravo. An alert posted on Twitter by volunteer group TXTFIRE said that at 6:58 p.m. the fire at Hernandez St. in Barangay Catmon, Malabon reached Task Force Alpha. Task Force Bravo was raised at 8:03 p.m. 
— TXTFIREPhilippines (@TXTFIRE) February 8, 2017 Under Task Force Alpha, a total of 23 fire trucks are expected to respond while 27 fire trucks are expected under Task Force Bravo in Malabon. The blaze was under control by 11:52 p.m.
